9252d7d6-af0f-4ffd-881d-60ad7272d59d: -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on Fortitude {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} and a -2 per creature's HD to its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}.
8c00d8b1-b6ef-40ef-98ba-1f378251d019: These boots give the wearer a +4 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}. The wearer's movement doesn't provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If these boots are worn together with the Owl's Cowl, the enhancement bonus increases to +6, and the wearer additionally gains a +5 bonus on all {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
cb09fd07-2753-4345-b219-569f96ffeeca: These bracers are adorned with fragments of a boar's tusks. They grant the wearer a +6 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}. Whenever the wearer charges using a {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attack{/g}, their first {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} has its base {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dice tripled.
b62e8a83-8a7d-46ef-9e05-c5cd3fd08164: These gloves are made of the hide of a legendary ancient Sarkorian bear-god. If the wearer has a claw attack, the damage dice for this attack increases by one step (for example, {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} becomes 1d6). They also grant the wearer a +5 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g}.
50c2d619-21ee-4fc6-8c1b-ae46b3db12b5: These golden bracers grant their wearer an ability to cast scorching ray 3 times per day as a 12 level caster. They also increase the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} against all Evocation school {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} the wearer casts by 2.
160dfb79-84b3-4b86-b7fd-65b3b2d8c888: These tattered and ragged garments extend the duration of a shifter's transformation, allowing then to shift into their aspects' minor forms for 5 additional minutes per day. When the wearer assumes a major form, they gain a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}.
7430b4b6-a909-470c-8e10-72e079450997: This +3 barding grants its wearer immunity to poison and trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}.
44ce99b3-c89a-4ae3-b532-14a5f5db9c51: This +3 full plate armor grants its wearer a +3 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} and a +4 enhancement bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}. It also grants its wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/- against the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} of the undead.
33d1d383-6040-4156-9852-dfb12cf4b07a: This belt once worn by a notorious Gorilla King. To unlock its true powers, one needs to become one with their true nature. The belt grants its wearer a +6 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}. When worn by a shifter who has a final aspect (or any other 20 level capstone class ability), the enhancement bonuses increase to +8, and the wearer additionally gains the ability to once per day emit a devastating cry. It deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}10d12{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} to every enemy in a 30 feet range, stunning them for 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} (a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} halves the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and negates the stunned condition). Every ally in the same range instead receives a +4 morale bonus on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and damage rolls for one minute.
ba39a865-1224-4c3c-9e8b-ad248db371b3: This cowl gives the wearer a +6 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}. If the wearer benefits from any shifter aspect, they also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}. If this cowl is worn together with the Cat's Boots, the wearer additionally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
baab99a0-a0c2-4255-ad2f-792abf9c70e2: This jagged steel ring was made of an armor shard, picked up on a battlefield and crudely bent into the shape of a circle. Its wearer can at will choose any foe they see. The wearer gets a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made by the chosen enemy, until the wearer chooses another one.
81a7f724-fe38-4f32-b584-1642c42b50af: This quarterstaff is adorned with thousands of locust husks.
e50ca2b8-40ba-450d-a534-874539c08c08: This ring grants its wearer a +2 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}. Their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against lycanthropes gain a +2 enhancement bonus on attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}. Once per day, the wearer of this ring can apply the effect of the haste {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} to themselves for 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
e1686063-5ce6-4f57-861c-1b25d4442ffd:
This ring grants its wearer a +6 deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. Whenever the wearer hits an enemy with a slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, it breaks a random bone in the target's body, applying a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}:
1. Rib: a -1 penalty on Fortitude {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} and a -2 per creature's HD to its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}.
2. Skull: -1 penalty on Will saving throws.
3. Leg: {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} reduced by 5 foot.
4. Arm: -1 penalty on all attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
Each penalty stacks up to 5 times. It can't be applied to creatures without bones or those who don't need them, such as aberrations, undead, constructs and plants. It persists for 1 day.
125486f4-03ed-47dc-a8cf-038541fdb87d: Twigs sprout from these tall brown boots. While the wearer is on the ground, ghostly roots grow from the boots' soles, granting their wearer tremorsense 30 feet. While the roots are active the wearer gains a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} against trip, bull rush, overrun and grapple {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuvers{/g}.
109cf6a9-fb33-4f57-92e4-74ed223a737a: Whenever the wearer of this mask hits an enemy with a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, they immediately make another bite attack with the full attack {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
af4347ac-4d76-42dd-b852-2a328a32fc41: While holding this +2 quarterstaff, the wielder gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/- against the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} of swarms. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}Melee attacks{/g} with the staff deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} to all swarms, even those that would normally be immune to weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. The wielder can use the staff to cast remove sickness three times per day as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
